segments.text: Good afternoon , Mr.Stein . I wonder if you are free tomorrow evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure , but let me check my schedule ... Ah , no . I have nothing then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! Our president has asked me to come over to invite you to the banquet held in your honor at the Beijing Hotel at 7:00 . Here's an invitation card for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How nice of him ! I'll be delighted to go . But what time would be convenient ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll be here to pick you up at 6:30 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good . It's most thoughtful of you to do this , Miss Wood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . Well , then , see you tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1
